name: Laser Blaster
description: A crisp beam emitter built for precision takedowns.

name: Plasma Shotgun
description: A wide plasma burst that clips every foe in front of you.

name: Rocket Launcher
description: Heavy ordnance that takes time to line up, then detonates across the battlefield.

name: Shock Fists
description: Gauntlets that crackle with a focused lightning jab.

name: Quake Knuckles
description: A heavy sweep that rattles the whole line.

name: Maul Gauntlet
description: A charged impact that detonates into a shockwave.

name: Prism Focus
description: A refined jewel that sharpens a psychic beam.

name: Halo Array
description: Diffuse light that grazes every target at once.

name: Stasis Core
description: Builds a charge before snapping targets in a psychic burst.

name: Whisperblade
description: A razor-thin edge built for silent takedowns.

name: Splitter Edge
description: A sweeping blade that tags every foe in range.

name: Void Fang
description: A charged lunge that erupts into a void surge.

name: Bulwark Plate
description: Reinforced plating built to soak the hardest hits.

name: Surge Harness
description: Shock-dampened straps that keep a bruiser light on his feet.

name: Brawler Rig
description: Weighted buckles that turn every swing into a statement.

name: Ward Coat
description: Layered fibers that steady the line and protect allies.

name: Channeler Mantle
description: A calm weave that sharpens focus under pressure.

name: Driftweave Cloak
description: A weightless cloak for constant repositioning.

name: Nullguard Coat
description: A dense coat that buys time when the ambush turns.

name: Phaseweave Jacket
description: Flickering panels that help you slip between strikes.

name: Killer Harness
description: Lean rigging tuned for ruthless, accurate cuts.

name: Scraprunner Jacket
description: A patched jacket that keeps Ollie fast and focused.

name: Helioguard Plate
description: Sunburst plating that steadies Nova through recoil.

name: Flux Liner
description: Lightweight layers that keep Nova dancing between volleys.

name: Starline Jacket
description: Luminous threading keeps Nova steady while charging the next shot.

name: Trailblazer Vest
description: A rugged vest tuned for Ollie's scrappy scouting.

name: Canopy Mantle
description: Leaf-styled layers that hide Ollie in the treeline.

name: Basic Slingshot
description: Careful not to shoot yer eye out.

name: Battery Pack
description: A simple battery pack for providing a charge.

name: Black Coffee
Broken Arcade Display
description: The broken display of Sam & Ellie's arcade cabinet. Might just need a new filament.

name: Broken Coffee Grinder
description: A broken industrial coffee grinder. Maybe reinforcing this with some additional metal could fix it.

name: Broken Projector
description: A broken projector. It looks like this one is going to need a new circuit board.

name: Digital Watch
description: Harnesses the power of time.

name: Ellie's Signature Sampler
description: A little bit of everything from your friends at Sam & Ellie's Diner!

name: Gadget Belt
description: Now all you need is a cape and a cowl.

name: Starbar Crunch
description: Sugary compressed carbs that keep you jittery through long runs.

name: Mineral Trail Mix
description: Protein nibs dusted with electrolytes mined from the Stellarium tunnels.

name: Comet Gummies
description: Sour gummies shaped like tiny comets that sharpen your focus.

name: Stellar Scone
description: A crumbly pastry you can split with a friend when things get rough.

name: Void Jerky
description: Salt-smoked protein that leaves your hands numb and your hits heavier.

name: Ion Poppers
description: Fizzy beads that steady your aim for a few heartbeats.

name: Sunder Seeds
description: Bitter seeds you spit like shrapnel, leaving armor loose at the seams.

name: Pulse Citrus
description: Tart wedges that kick your heartbeat into a sprint.

name: Iron Biscuit
description: Dense, salty bread that settles the nerves before impact.

name: Mindfruit Slice
description: Cool, bright fruit that sharpens decisions on the spot.

name: Rattle Pepper
description: A hot snap that drives punches deeper.

name: Slipstream Mochi
description: Chewy bites that keep your steps a half-beat ahead.

name: Shadow Kelp
description: Inky strips that dull an opponent's aim.

name: Ember Broth
description: A warm sip that steadies breathing and mends small wounds.

name: Void Crisp
description: A dark crunch that primes ruthless strikes.

name: Keystone
description: The Keystone emits a low hum.

name: Latte
description: Who doesn't like a good latte?

name: Medkit I
description: A basic medkit.

name: Nano Filament
description: A tiny filament.

name: Repaired Arcade Display
description: This ought to fix up the arcade cabinet at the diner.

name: Repaired Coffee Grinder
description: Maddie's repaired industrial coffee grinder. Back to the grind with you!

name: Repaired Projector
description: The school's repaired projector. Good as new.

name: Schematic: Power Lens Mk. I
description: A blueprint detailing how to construct an enhanced Power Lens.

name: Mining Keycard
description: A magnetic pass that unlocks sealed sections of the Stellarium mines.

name: Ration Pack
description: Compressed protein slabs, caffeine chews, and a flask of electrolyte soup. Restores 40 HP.

name: Energy Core
description: A stabilized energy core destined for Jed's workshop.

name: Raw Fish
description: Freshly caught fish used in hearty cooking recipes.

name: Saltwater Fish
description: A sturdy ocean catch prized by station chefs.

name: Forest Carp
description: A rare carp from the arboreal cisterns around Nova Prime.

description: A basic rod for practicing the new fishing techniques.

description: A lightweight rod with improved stability and casting power.

name: Carbon Rod
description: Premium carbon fiber rod for veteran anglers.

description: Simple lure that keeps curious fish nearby.

name: Shiny Lure
description: Reflective lure that increases uncommon bite rates.

name: Mystery Lure
description: Experimental lure rumored to attract exotic catches.

name: Herb
description: A fragrant herb that brightens most dishes.

name: Noodles
description: Compressed noodles that boil quickly in the field.

name: Fiery Pepper
description: A scorching pepper harvested near geothermal vents.

description: Lean meat carved from the local megafauna.

description: A simple stew that warms the crew after a long patrol.

description: A blazing broth that clears the mind and sharpens focus.

description: Reinforced fiber sheets used as a base for armor mods.

name: Wiring Bundle

description: A cryogenic coil taken from damaged refrigeration rigs.

description: A repaired cryo-inductor ready for mission-critical rigs.

name: Power Cell

name: Chemical Catalyst
description: Stabilizes volatile mixtures when crafting first-aid kits.
